content.raw:
Now the implementation has an optional `_up` vector, which is `UnitZ` by default. If you specify `UnitY` as your up vector for example, the camera needs to roll.

The up vector is mostly a suggestion though, because in several cases it is not possible to keep it and at the same time keep looking at the target. In the demo, that is demonstrated by the semi-transparent blue cylinder, which diverges from the frame's Z axis, for example, when you need a pitch to tilt the camera.
